description: Try our easy to follow Indian Seafood Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Indian Seafood Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon rice onto serving plates. Top with the curry. Cut eggs into wedges and place onto curry with remaining coriander sprigs. Serve with lemon wedges and pappadums.
